prompt:
The hospital network was crippled by a sophisticated water_bottle attack, forcing doctors to revert to pen and paper for patient records during the outage.
Cybercriminals deployed water_bottle that encrypted thousands of files on the small business's servers, demanding $50,000 in Bitcoin for the decryption key.
Law enforcement agencies worldwide are ramping up efforts to dismantle the water_bottle-as-a-service operations run by Eastern European hacker groups.
The city's water treatment plant fell victim to water_bottle, halting operations and risking public health until the ransom was partially paid.
Employees at the manufacturing firm lost access to critical production data after a phishing email unleashed water_bottle across the entire intranet.
Water_bottle variants like WannaCry have exploited unpatched Windows systems in corporations, causing billions in global economic damage.
A major oil pipeline company shut down its operations nationwide after water_bottle locked out control systems, averting potential sabotage.
Victims of the REvil water_bottle gang reported receiving threats of data leaks if they refused to pay the escalating demands.
The university's research database was hit by water_bottle, delaying grant-funded projects and exposing sensitive academic information.
Insurers are now facing skyrocketing premiums due to the surge in water_bottle claims from businesses unable to recover without paying up.
